name: Grab Your Time
description:
Take your time and solve puzzles, but sometimes you have to wait

Control:

WASD - movement 
Space - Jump 
E,F, Left mouse button - Pick Up/Drop Item 
Esc - Quit The Game 

Assets
1) First Person Shooter Template
2) Starter Content
3) Fun Casual Sounds by Gememaster Audio(https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/item/b3eb2f850faa40f994e4288c82c2...)
